00040 #ifndef PHYSEVENTUSERINPUT_CPP
00041 #define PHYSEVENTUSERINPUT_CPP
00042 ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00043 // This will expose all keyboard and mouse, joystick and other userinput events
00044 // to developers, we are using the SDL keymap to get us started, large portions
00045 // are directly copy/pasta'd, so we included their license too
00046 ///////////////////////////////////////

00064 PhysEventUserInput::PhysEventUserInput()
00065 {
00066 
00067 }
00068 
00069 PhysEventUserInput::PhysEventUserInput(const MetaCode &Code_)
00070 {
00071     Code.push_back(Code_);
00072 }
00073 
00074 PhysEventUserInput::PhysEventUserInput(const vector<MetaCode> &Code_)
00075 {
00076     for(unsigned int c=0; Code_.size()>c ; c++)
00077     {
00078         Code.push_back(Code_.at(c));
00079     }
00080 }
00081 
00082 PhysEventUserInput::~PhysEventUserInput()
00083 {
00084 
00085 }
00086 
00087 const MetaCode PhysEventUserInput::GetMetaCode(const unsigned int &Index)
00088 {
00089     return Code.at(Index);
00090 }
00091 
00092 unsigned int PhysEventUserInput::GetMetaCodeCount()
00093 {
00094     return Code.size();
00095 }
00096 
00097 void PhysEventUserInput::AddCode(const MetaCode &Code_)
00098 {
00099     Code.push_back(Code_);
00100 }
00101 
00102 void PhysEventUserInput::AddCode(const RawEvent &RawEvent_)
00103 {
00104     MetaCode CurrentMetaCode( RawEvent_ );
00105     this->AddCode(CurrentMetaCode);
00106 }
00107 
00108 void PhysEventUserInput::AddCode(const int &MetaValue_, const short unsigned int &ID_, const MetaCode::InputCode &Code_)
00109 {
00110     MetaCode CurrentMetaCode( MetaValue_, ID_, Code_ );
00111     this->AddCode(CurrentMetaCode);
00112 }
00113 
00114 void PhysEventUserInput::EraseCode(const MetaCode &Code_)
00115 {
00116     vector<MetaCode>::iterator iter;
00117 
00118     for(iter=Code.begin(); Code.end()!=iter ; iter++)
00119     {
00120         if(*iter == Code_)
00121         {
00122             Code.erase(iter);
00123         }
00124     }
00125 }
00126 
00127 void PhysEventUserInput::EraseCode(const unsigned int &Index)
00128 {
00129     Code.erase(Code.begin()+Index);
00130 }
00131 
00132 void PhysEventUserInput::ToggleCode(const MetaCode &Code_)
00133 {
00134     vector<MetaCode>::iterator iter;
00135 
00136     bool ErasedOne= false;
00137 
00138     for(iter=Code.begin(); Code.end()!=iter ; iter++)
00139     {
00140         if(*iter == Code_)
00141         {
00142             Code.erase(iter);
00143             ErasedOne=true;
00144         }
00145     }
00146 
00147     if(!ErasedOne)
00148         {Code.push_back(Code_);}
00149 }
00150 
00151 EventType PhysEventUserInput::getEventType()
00152 {
00153     return UserInput;
00154 }
00155 
00156 void PhysEventUserInput::AddCodesFromRawEvent(const RawEvent &RawEvent_)
00157 {
00158 
00159 
00160     switch(RawEvent_.type)
00161     {
00162         case SDL_KEYDOWN:   //Only contains one metacode
00163         case SDL_KEYUP:
00164             this->AddCode(RawEvent_);
00165             break;
00166 
00167         case SDL_MOUSEMOTION:       //Can contain Multiple Metacodes
00168             this->AddCodesFromSDLMouseMotion(RawEvent_);
00169             break;
00170         case SDL_MOUSEBUTTONDOWN:
00171         case SDL_MOUSEBUTTONUP:
00172             this->AddCodesFromSDLMouseButton(RawEvent_);
00173             break;
00174 
00175         case SDL_JOYAXISMOTION: //Incomplete
00176             break;
00177         case SDL_JOYBUTTONDOWN:
00178             break;
00179         case SDL_JOYBUTTONUP:
00180             break;
00181         case SDL_JOYBALLMOTION:
00182             break;
00183         case SDL_JOYHATMOTION:
00184             break;
00185         default:
00186             throw ("Unknown SDL Event Inserted");
00187             break;
00188     }
00189 }
00190 
00191 
00192 ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00193 // PhysEventUserInput Private Methods
00194 ///////////////////////////////////////
00195 
00196 void PhysEventUserInput::AddCodesFromSDLMouseMotion(const RawEvent &RawEvent_)
00197 {
00198     this->AddCode(RawEvent_.motion.x,0,MetaCode::MOUSEABSOLUTEHORIZONTAL);
00199     this->AddCode(RawEvent_.motion.y,0,MetaCode::MOUSEABSOLUTEVERTICAL);
00200 
00201     if(0 != RawEvent_.motion.xrel)
00202         {this->AddCode(RawEvent_.motion.xrel,0,MetaCode::MOUSEVERTICAL);}
00203 
00204     if(0 != RawEvent_.motion.yrel)
00205         {this->AddCode(RawEvent_.motion.yrel,0,MetaCode::MOUSEHORIZONTAL);}
00206 
00207 /*1
00208     //MOUSEBUTTON from the button state   //Button Polling
00209 */
00210 }
00211 
00212 void PhysEventUserInput::AddCodesFromSDLMouseButton(const RawEvent &RawEvent_)
00213 {
00214     //MetaCode::MetaCode(const int &MetaValue_, const short unsigned int &ID_, const MetaCode::InputCode &Code_)
00215     this->AddCode(RawEvent_.button.x,0,MetaCode::MOUSEABSOLUTEHORIZONTAL);
00216 
00217     this->AddCode(RawEvent_.button.y,0,MetaCode::MOUSEABSOLUTEVERTICAL);
00218 
00219     if ( SDL_BUTTON_WHEELUP==RawEvent_.button.button)
00220     {
00221         this->AddCode(MetaCode::MOUSEWHEEL_UP,0,MetaCode::MOUSEWHEELVERTICAL);
00222     }else if( SDL_BUTTON_WHEELDOWN==RawEvent_.button.button ){
00223         this->AddCode(MetaCode::MOUSEWHEEL_DOWN,0,MetaCode::MOUSEWHEELVERTICAL);
00224     }else{
00225         if(RawEvent_.button.state==SDL_PRESSED)
00226         {
00227             this->AddCode(MetaCode::BUTTON_PRESSING, RawEvent_.button.button, MetaCode::MOUSEBUTTON);
00228         }else{
00229             this->AddCode(MetaCode::BUTTON_LIFTING, RawEvent_.button.button, MetaCode::MOUSEBUTTON);
00230         }
00231     }
00232 
00233 }
